greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Polylogarithm li(-n,-1/100) multiplied by (101^(n+1))/100.
comment: See the sequence A212846 which describes the general case of li(-n,-p/q). This sequence is obtained for p=1,q=100.
link: Stanislav Sykora, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: See formula in A212846, setting p=1,q=100.
results.author: _Stanislav Sykora_, Jun 06 2012
